title: Yin Yang Strategy Analysis - Divide and Conquer

principle.statement: Yin and Yang - Balance of subtle and direct, hidden and visible, nourish and expose
principle.explanation: EDIBLE LONDON is the Yin (subtle, hidden, nourishing). RAMIZ is the Yang (direct, visible, exposing). Together they divide and conquer.

yin_strategy.approach: Subtle nourishment. The enemy won't know.

characteristics.enemy_awareness: Very Low - Enemy sees food, not transformation
characteristics.resistance: Minimal - No one questions food security

yin_strategy.role: Nourish people, communities, earth. Transform through nourishment. The enemy won't know.

yang_strategy.approach: Direct truth exposure. Divide and conquer.
yang_strategy.role: Expose lies. Share truth. Divide enemy. Conquer through knowledge. Transform through truth.

divide_and_conquer.explanation: Yin (EDIBLE) nourishes subtly. Yang (RAMIZ) exposes directly. Together they divide the enemy and conquer through truth and nourishment.

yin_division.method: EDIBLE divides enemy subtly by nourishing their people
yin_division.approach: When people are nourished, they see truth. When communities are nourished, they unite. When earth is nourished, it supports transformation.
yin_division.enemy_response: Enemy doesn't see the division. They see food security. They don't know their people are being transformed through nourishment.

yang_division.method: RAMIZ divides enemy directly by exposing their lies
yang_division.approach: Expose political sabotages. Expose humanity errors. Share truth. Divide enemy through knowledge.
yang_division.enemy_response: Enemy sees truth exposure. They might resist. But truth divides them. Knowledge conquers them.

conquest.method: Together, Yin and Yang conquer through nourishment and truth
conquest.approach: Yin nourishes (subtle). Yang exposes (direct). Together they transform. Together they conquer.
conquest.enemy_response: Enemy is divided. Enemy is conquered. Through nourishment and truth. Through subtle and direct.

balance.explanation: Yin (EDIBLE) works subtly. Yang (RAMIZ) works directly. Together they balance. Together they divide and conquer.

application.yin_focus: Nourish subtly. Transform through nourishment. The enemy won't know.
application.yang_focus: Expose directly. Transform through truth. Divide and conquer.
application.together: Yin nourishes while Yang exposes. Together they divide. Together they conquer. Together they transform.
